Package net.xuset.objectIO.connections

Connections is the package which houses the how a message is sent.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Connection
    Interface that outlines operations for sending and receiving messages across various mediums.
    Hub<T extends Connection>
    A container interface for Connection objects.
    StreamConI
    An extension of Connection, this interface outlines methods that could by useful for connections that are backed by streams.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractConnection
    Basic, abstract implementation of Connection.
    ConnectionHub<T extends Connection>
    A basic implementation of a hub.
    FileCon
    Connection that can be used to send and receive MarkupMsg to and from a file.
    StreamCon
    StreamCon is implementation of Connection that is backed by streams.
    StreamConReader
    This class continually monitors the input stream for new data.

Package net.xuset.objectIO.connections Description

Connections is the package which houses the how a message is sent. Every connection that sends and receives MarkupMsg objects inherits the Connection interface. Something that stores multiple connections should inherit the Hub interface.
See Also:
FileCon, StreamCon, TcpCon
